AUTHOR: palmtree5
INSTALL_MSG:
Thanks for installing FEUnitPicker, which chooses units to use in a playthrough of supported Fire Emblem games.
[p]help FEUnitPicker to see commands. No additional dependencies needed.
For support: <http://support.palmtree5.com>

If you like my work and want to support me, please consider becoming a Patron over at <https://patreon.com/palmtree5>
NAME: FEUnitPicker
DESCRIPTION: Creates a character draft based on user input
